info.title: Liferay Commerce Admin Channel API
info.description: Liferay Commerce Admin Channel API. A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.commerce.admin.channel.client', and version '4.0.44'.

get.description: Retrive information of the given Channel.
Retrive information of the given Channel.

accountEntryToPublisherAssets.description: Information about the object relationship accountEntryToPublisherAssets can be embedded with "nestedFields".
